alert.note: Alert for Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 12:19PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. The highest totals will be south and west of a line from Bangor to Jonesport. Lower totals are expected across far northeastern portions of the advisory area. * WHERE...Coastal Washington, Interior Hancock, and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
